name: Super Rolling Cat
description:
We are a group of friends living in Brazil  passionate about game development.
We made this game with a lot of love (and cats hahaha), hope you like it! 💖

Have fun! 😸

Description:

Roll the ball to help the Cat collect the fishes and reach the finish line as fast as you can!
Can you do it? 😼

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys / WASD
